name: VEXON
description:
Made for LÖVE Jam 2022

Jump over the polygons to get points.

Controls

Move - Arrow keys
Jump - Z
Dash - X
Restart - R

Note:

On the last day of the jam I was planning on adding a menu and stuff, but my PC broke. Luckily I already uploaded this demo for people to play.

When my PC is repaired I will continue working on the game. So stay tuned for a post-jam version!
